overview: Wang Xiaolei, the educated youth who joined the team to come to the manfeizhai farm, found that the problem of the farm was very serious. Du Shiyou, the production officer, is heavily engaged in speculation and profiteering with the support of Li Chang Chang. In dealing with workers, they engage in material stimulation and give rewards to workers who have over fulfilled their tasks. Xiaolei not only opposes, but also constantly reflects up.
title: Expectation
